attributes.action: Effectuate Return of Cultural Objects Act for Koh-i-Noor from British Monarchy.
attributes.additional_details:
During British Raj (1858-1947), the British Empire did steal artefacts and posses them in Crown Jewels. These shouldn't be considered as just an artefact, they are part of Colonised states history and culture. We demand the government to return stolen jewels back to Colonised States.
Returning back of these artefacts should be considered under the extension of Holocaust (Return of Cultural Objects) Act 2009. 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Koh-i-Noor
http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2009/16/contents
attributes.background: The Government should act to implement the Return of Cultural Objects from British Monarchy where stolen artefacts from colonised states are still preserved under Crown Jewels for decades even after the end of British Raj.
